title: 求1.7.10的端

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
yymx2008 发表于 2020-7-21 10:56
我大开还没两秒闪退啊
可能是你电脑内存不够？
我的启动脚本默认分配的3G
你可以编辑start.bat 把里面的3G改成1G试试

replies.author: yymx2008
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-21 10:51
https://c-t.work/s/2f0a64644e834e
解压之后点击start.bat即可启动
Error occurred during initialization of VM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap
请按任意键继续. . .

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
yymx2008 发表于 2020-7-21 10:58
Error occurred during initialization of VM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap
请按任意 ...
那没跑了
Could not reserve enough space for object heap

有两个情况
1. 你内存足够 但是你安装了32位的java 导致不能分配1G以上内存，可以卸载之前安装的java，安装这一个版本的 https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe
2. 你内存不足以分配3G 请修改启动脚本
